title: Crawler Input
description: Configure site crawling for company background extraction.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Root URL or sitemap to start crawling from (e.g., https://example.com).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests Per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl.

selector.title: Content Selector (CSS or XPath)
selector.description: CSS selector or XPath to extract page text (e.g., body or //main). Defaults to body.

waitForSelectorTimeoutMs.title: Wait for Selector Timeout (ms)
waitForSelectorTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for waiting on selector or XPath to appear.

match.title: Include URL Globs
match.description: Glob patterns to include when enqueueing links (uses Crawlee globs). If empty, strategy defaults to same-domain.

exclude.title: Exclude URL Globs
exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from enqueueing.

cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.description: Optional cookies to set before navigation.
